title: #ICYMI - Breaking the Rules–The Physics & Psychology of Cheating
description: In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel… You can break the rules of the game, but you can’t break the rules of physics. Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly investigate the physics and psychology of cheating, with physicist John Eric Goff and sport psychologist Dr. Leah Lagos.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
